newsitem.title: USA: En Pointe sees $25-$40 mln revs from new deals.
newsitem.headline: En Pointe sees $25-$40 mln revs from new deals.

text.p: En Pointe Technologies Inc said Monday new contracts awarded to it in the quarter ended June 30 have potential revenues of from $25 million to $40 million annually.
At the same time, the company's En Point Consulting division is experiencing tremendous growth, said Kevin Schatzle, the company's ssenior vice president.

The company issued the statement as it reported earnings per share of $0.25 on revenues of $128.4 million for its third fiscal quarter of 1997, from $0.10 per share on revenues of from $88.9 million for the corresponding period a year ago.
